This torrent contains all 22 episodes.

Here are some details about the official DVD:

The Animated Adventures of Gene Roddenberry's Star Trek, 
the four-disc set will hit stores on November 21, 2006.

The 22 episodes (8 hours, 46 mins) will be pristinely remastered in high definition video 
and mixed in 5.1 Dolby Surround, 
and will be available to own for a suggested retail price of $62.99.
